languages.text: Each stack increases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by +5 and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} by +10.
